About Me

  • spinalen@carleton.edu
  • github.com/nickspinale
  • linkedin.com/in/nickspinale

I study Mathematics and Computer Science at Carleton College, and I am an intern at Google. I am also a 2016 hackNY alumnus.

My academic and professional interests include security, functional programming, programming language design, type theory, cryptography (both mathematical and applied), number theory, and graph theory.
